com.jswiff.swfrecords.tags
Class TagWriter

java.lang.Object
  com.jswiff.swfrecords.tags.TagWriter
public final class TagWriter
extends java.lang.Object

This class contains methods used for writing tag headers and tags.

Method Summary

          Writes a tag to a bit stream.

          Writes a tag to a data buffer.

          Writes the tags from the passed list to a byte array.
static void writeTags(OutputBitStream stream, java.util.List tags, short swfVersion)
          Writes the tags from the passed list to a bit stream.

                            Tag tag,
                            short swfVersion)
                     throws java.io.IOException

writeTags

public static byte[] writeTags(java.util.List tags,
                               short swfVersion,
                               boolean japanese)
                        throws java.io.IOException
Writes the tags from the passed list to a byte array. Additionally, an end tag is written at the end.

Parameters:
tags - list of tags to be written
swfVersion - SWF version
japanese - specifies whether japanese encoding is to be used for strings
Returns:
byte array containing tags
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occured

writeTags

                             java.util.List tags,
                             short swfVersion)
                      throws java.io.IOException
Writes the tags from the passed list to a bit stream. Additionally, an end tag is written at the end.

Parameters:
stream - target bit stream
tags - list of tags to be written
swfVersion - SWF version

java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occured
